name: DEAD END | 10:00 P.M.
description:
Dead End delivers a series of film and VR game experiences. The players can transfer themselves into a world that has no way out and must be ended. The world is stopped at the moment right before the dead end, but it still gives the viewers the space to imagine what is beyond that moment. 

The creator of this game is me, hzxian, all rights reserved.
